text.text_translated: Having more knowledge about the possible differences in what people expect and how they act can help us avoid misunderstandings. But it is very important that we also remember that cultural `stereotypes` can be bad for building good business relationships. Even though cultures from different countries can change the way we act and think, we are also mostly influenced by the area we come from, the groups we belong to, our age and gender, our company's culture, and our personal experiences of the world. For this reason, we should keep the knowledge of these possible differences in mind as a general idea, instead of using it to put all people from a whole country into one group.
